medium_description_en: Predicts survival in patients with spinal tumors.
instructions_en: Use this score to predict survival in patients with metastatic spinal disease.

seo.meta_description_en: The Revised Tokuhashi Scoring System predicts survival in patients with spinal tumors.

creator_info.about_en: Yasuaki Tokuhashi, MD, is a professor in the Department of Orthopedic Surgery at the Nihon University School of Medicine in Tokyo, Japan. He was awarded the Japan Spinal Instrumentation Research Society Award in 1997 and is a member of the Japanese Orthopedics Association. Dr. Tokuhashi’s primary research is focused on orthopedics and spinal tumor prognosis.
